meta.title: Contract #017: The Editor
meta.description: CENSORSHIP: High complexity hub. Determine why the front-page story was pulled.
meta.journal: The Editor didn't kill the story because of 'insufficient sources.' The Aethelgard wire transfer hit the accounts payable server at the exact moment the draft was flagged. Quid pro quo.

nodes.text: --:-- - Journalist: Submits 'Housing Crisis' draft to server.
--:-- - Editor Terminal: Draft received / Review started.
--:-- - Bank Server: Large deposit from 'Shell Corp' to Publisher.
--:-- - Editor Terminal: Status changed to 'KILL / DO NOT PUBLISH'.
